content: Nevertheless, that time of darkness and despair will not go on forever. The land of Zebulun and Naphtali will be humbled, but there will be a time in the future when Galilee of the Gentiles, which lies along the road that runs between the Jordan and the sea, will be filled with glory.
The Lord has spoken out against Jacob;
And the people of Israel and Samaria,
They said, “We will replace the broken bricks of our ruins with finished stone,
